DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 4 , prospective , multi-centric randomize control study compare effect bisoprolol atenolol rest heart rate ( RHR ) sympathetic nervous system 's ( SNS ) activity subject essential hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Study Assess Effects Bisoprolol Atenolol Resting Heart Rate Sympathetic Nervous System 's Activity Subjects With Essential Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 2565 year Subjects essential hypertension ( EH ) Subjects systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 140160 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) 90100 mmHg Subjects normal sinus rhythm Subjects rest heart rate ( RHR ) great 70 bpm Subjects give write informed consent Subjects atrial fibrillation ( AF ) /sick sinus syndrome ( SSS ) /atrioventricular block IIIII Grade ( AVB IIIII ) without pacemaker Subjects bradyarrhythmia/hypotension Subjects unstable angina pectoris ( UAP ) /acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) /heart failure ( HF ) ( New York Heart Association [ NYHA ] Class III IV ) Subjects uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( DM ) Subjects bronchial asthma Subjects gastrointestinal ulcer skin ulcer Subjects liver dysfunction/renal impairment Subjects treat calcium channel blocker ( except amlodipine ) betablockers . Subjects glaucoma Subjects know allergic/intolerance betablocker Pregnant lactate woman Subjects participate another clinical study within last 3 month Subjects legal incapacity limited legal capacity
